content.prompt: Which of the following will lead to an increase in the United States gross domestic product?

choices.label: More individuals prepare their own personal income tax forms.
Some citizens begin working abroad as computer programmers.
The government prohibits the sale of alcoholic beverages.
Foreign companies build new assembly plants in the United States.
A million United States households sell their used cars to their children.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
